name: Corridor (AdrienMarcenat)
description:
A puzzle game made for GMTK jam 2019.

In Corridor you can only move in one dimension, hopefully the world isn't what it seems... There are 12 levels that showcase a bunch of mechanics, hope you enjoy it.

Controls (remapable):

Move - Arrow

Undo - U

Pause - Escape

Credits:

Adrien Marcenat: Game Design, Programming, Sound and Music

Antoine Bassé: Art, Addditional Game Design

Code:

https://github.com/AdrienMarcenat/gmtkjam3
